description:
Mom is a cartoonist and she has a deadline to make today.  Despite this, she makes breakfast for the kids, takes them to school, and ends up volunteering to help draw the poster for the Parents` Bazaar Day.  Tomorrow, is Bunji`s birthday and he ends up getting sesame salt…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Manga Artist Mom / Mom, the manga artist / Scheme / Gush
漫画家かあさん / 漫画家かあさん大忙し / かんろく / びゅっ
